# Question 5

```{r}
vals <- rt(1000, 1)
norms<- sort(rnorm(500000, 0, 1))

indices <- ceiling(seq(from = 1,
               to = 500000,
               length.out = 1000))

reduced_norms <- norms[indices]
sorted_vals <- sort(vals)

sim_matrix <-  replicate(1000, sort(rnorm(1000, 0, 1)))
lower_env <- apply(sim_matrix, 1, quantile, probs = 0.025)
upper_env <- apply(sim_matrix, 1, quantile, probs = 0.975)
theoretical_q <- rowMeans(sim_matrix)

plot(reduced_norms,
     sorted_vals, ylim = c(-5, 5))
#abline(0,1)
lines(theoretical_q, lower_env, col = "red", lwd = 2)
lines(theoretical_q, upper_env, col = "green", lwd = 1)

#check
library(car)
qqPlot(vals, envelope = 0.95, ylim = c(-5, 5))



```
